Pattern Library

social links component

< back to style guide

RULES & DEPENDENCIES:

This component will have fields for:

  • icon: the font awesome class name e.g. "fab fa-facebook-f"
  • link
  • alternative image text
  • icon color (default is black)
  • background color (default is transparent)
